articles.title: Where Ukraine's sunflowers once sprouted, fears now grow - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The hopeful moment when American, Russian, and Ukrainian officials grabbed white-handled spades to plant sunflowers—marking the completion of Ukraine's nuclear disarmament—has given way to today's fears of renewed conflict and a new cold war. Today, Russian P…

articles.title: Meat Loaf, singer of I'd Do Anything For Love (But I Won't Do That), dies aged 74 - CNA
articles.description: The American singer and actor, otherwise known as Michael Lee Aday, had a career spanning six decades, and sold more than 100 million albums worldwide.
articles.content: Meat Loaf, the singer best known for the Bat Out Of Hell album and the hit song Id Do Anything For Love (But I Wont Do That), has died at the age of 74, a statement on his official Facebook page said… [+5081 chars]
